statements: UPDATE project_timelines SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE project_timelines SET milestone1_date = '2022-03-15', milestone1_status = 'Completed' WHERE project_name = 'Project Alpha';

UPDATE project_timelines SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2023-01-01', milestone1_date = '2022-04-15', milestone1_status = 'Completed', milestone2_date = '2022-08-30', milestone2_status = 'In Progress', milestone3_date = '2022-12-15', milestone3_status = 'Not Started' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE project_timelines SET project_name = 'New Project Name', milestone1_status = 'In Progress', milestone2_date = '2022-09-30' WHERE project_id = 2;
UPDATE TeamMembers SET role = 'Manager' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ProjectMilestones SET completed = true, milestone_name = 'Final Review' WHERE project_id = 5;
UPDATE TeamMembers SET role='Manager' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE ProjectMilestones SET due_date='2022-10-31', completed=true WHERE milestone_name='Design Phase';
UPDATE team_projects SET start_date='2022-01-01', end_date='2022-12-31' WHERE project_id=1;
UPDATE project_milestones SET milestone_date='2022-06-30' WHERE milestone_id=3;
UPDATE team_projects SET team_lead='Alice' WHERE project_name='Project X';
UPDATE team_members SET member_name='Bob' WHERE project_id=(SELECT project_id FROM team_projects WHERE project_name='Project Y');
